Package com.day.cq.mcm.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Brand
    Helps working with brand resources.
    Campaign
    Helps working with campaign resources.
    Experience
    Content for a touchpoint.
    MCMFacade
    This is the central entry point for accessing plugins and configuration info on MCM.
    MCMPlugin
    Plugin to extend MCM with Experiences and Touchpoints.
    MCMPluginAdapter.Factory<T>  
    Touchpoint
    A location to present an Experience at.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapFilter
    Filters maps by checking if each of a filter map's values is contained in the keys of the filtered map.
    MCMPluginAdapter
    Helps when implementing MCMPlugin.
    MCMUtil
    Utility methods for MCM.
    TouchpointAdapter
    Helps with the implementation of a Touchpoint.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MCMResourceType
    The different upper-level resource types of MCM.
